about_me.des: Hi! My name is Leandro Iannotti, I am a systems engineer and full-stack developer. I am passionate in Computer Sciences, logical and mathematical problems. Strong architectural, product design and leadership capabilities. I maintain excellent communication with stakeholders and a proactive attitude.Interested in big data, integrations and in different frameworks that can facilitate the user experience.

projects.censo: Project aimed at gathering information about the land movement, plot maintenance and population control of a state.
projects.bigdata: Project made for the university using different data control tools from Apache Hadoop
projects.botflix: Telegram bot made in python in order to automate the download of movies and series. Works with different APIs such as Radarr, Sonarr, IMDB, TMDV and Plex

education.facu: University of Buenos Aires - Bachellor in Computer Science.
education.facu_des: Student of the Computer Science carrer in the Univeristy of Buenos Aires.

career.southward_desc: Junior developer, using languages such as Java, PHP and JS. Databases in MySql.
career.geo_des:
Software development for different organisms in Argentina. 
A large part of the tasks involved the development of GIS systems. Development of Web and Desktop applications. Maintenance of Oracle databases. 
Android developer .We made an application for the Cadastral sector, using different technologies such as C Sharp, VB .NET, Oracle Database. 
Counting also with an interaction with Autocad and Mapguide
career.infor_desc:
Responsible for customizing products at a technical level. 
Working with software from the area of logistics and asset maintenance. 
Continuous communication with the client to discuss the proposals we offered. 
Close participation in the functional environment of the logistics area. 
SQL server database administration, programming of stored procedures and jobs for customizations.
Part of the production of logistics management systems for medical laboratories in Argentina. 
Tasks consisted of implementing interfaces of our product (Infor SCE WMS) to external systems (vehicle tracking, traceability, etc), then we work on other implementations based on the previous one.
career.sandfield_desc:
Part of the customer facing team.
Design and development of RESTful APIs,mobile apps and websites for the biggest logistics company in New Zealand. 
Cross-platform Mobile AppsDevelopment using Cordova Framework.
Developer and designer for Connect Enterprise, a Supply Chain management and tracking product used byone of the largest logistics companies in Australia, working mostly with .NET, Javascript and MSSQL
Technical Leader for medium size teams (6-7 developers) working on individual systems.
Designing and implementing interfaces to integrate with third-party software platforms and hardware
